title: WTB Elberfeld W portrait or NY Hindu
author: destijl03

posts.post_title: WTB Elberfeld W portrait or NY Hindu
posts.post_content: Hey guys, I’m in search of either an Elberfeld Washington portrait or a NY portrait with a Hindu back. Looking for raw or graded in the 2-3 range for both. Anything better than that is likely out of my price range :)
That’s a beauty, Ryan! Thanks for the reply. I should have been more specific, I’m looking for a Washington portrait T206  :D Forgot there were Washington portraits from other sets!
